name: Jack Baker Experimental Games
description:
- Saving Seasons-

Seasons based puzzle game, click through the various seasons to find the solution to keep the man alive!

-Gravity Bounce-

Click around your ship to try and guide him home, beware of all the various gravity sources trying to pull them around though.

-Cannon Brawl-

Race against a friend to try and destroy all of their lives with your cannon before they destroy yours.

-Noisy Robbers-

Take on the role of a narcoleptic burglar's boss use your voice to try and guide him to the exit by telling him when its safe to move, just watch out for when he might fall asleep.
